alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 4:32AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Louisiana and southern Mississippi. * WHEN...From 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
